Summary Heading: A pleasant stay that met most expectations
Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights to visit Disneyland.  The property is clean and updated and we'll kept. I was impressed with how well staffed the property was- from the parking attendant,  valet staff, to security and front desk personnel.  Most were very friendly too! The room was a nice size and well appointed for a value motel. We had a room on the 5th floor. Unfortunately,  we were behind the elevator shift which makes a lot of noise. Other than that, the walls seem well insulated and there wasn't a lot of other noise to deal with. Housekeeping only comes every 3 days, so they only came once in a 5 day stay. That's really not acceptable. 3 people living out of one room, it's going to need cleaned and replenished.  Think about outfitting the rooms with a 20 gallon trash can, not
Room tip: Laundry rooms on most floors,  2 washers and 2 dryers that accept credit cards

The location is perfect if you are visiting Disneyland as it is a 5-10 minute walk to the front gate. There is not a complimentary breakfast served in the morning, but there is a McDonald's next door. It is easy to stop by there to grab some breakfast as it is on the way to Disneyland. I will definitely stay here again when visiting Disneyland!

There is also a McDonalds and a short walk away is

Thank you for mentioning our well-appointed accommodations, prime location, courteous staff and plentiful food and beverage options with Pizza Hut Express®and Panera located right here at our resort. We appreciate you recommending us to future guests, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Joy W Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: We had a great stay here with no complaints! As we were staying a while we were upgraded to a better room which was very appreciated. The staff were nice and helpful and the hotel, gym and room were clean. Ask for a room facing the park as it is quieter and you have a chance of seeing the fireworks from your room. You can’t beat the location for Disneyland, it was only a 5 minute walk to the main gate and super close to food choices like ihop and Denny’s. Highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Rachael T,  What a pleasure to read your outstanding review about your time at Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. Thank you for mentioning our convivial staff, fresh accommodations, well-equipped fitness center, and prime location. We are grateful for your recommendation, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Joy W Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: The rooms are good and the beds are ok. Whatever you do done get a room along the back of the hotel as the road noise from the freeway is very loud an constant. We did go into a room on the side facing Disney and there is no noise. Great location panera bread is great
Manager Response: Dear Pockle88,  Thank you for your review regarding your stay at Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. We are glad overall you had a pleasant experience and were impressed with our accommodations and convenient location. We are grateful for your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Anaheim.  Joy W Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Great staff, excellent location and good rooms !
Summary: After a poor experience in the Hilton @ Universal City we really needed a better experience and were not disappointed.   The difference in staff was clearly noticeable ! We had a very warm welcome and nothing was too much trouble. And the staff showed great customer service throughout our stay.   The rooms were standard with plenty of space and were clean and very comfortable. Also importantly we found the noise levels very good with no problems with outside noise or noise from other rooms.   Finally the location for Disneyland is perfect a very short 5 min walk and you are there.   The surrounding area was nice, with a range of restaurants from fast food to high end dining.   Overall a very enjoyable stay !!
Manager Response: Dear Michael G,  What a pleasure to read your outstanding review about your time at Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. Thank you for mentioning our well-appointed accommodations, courteous staff, and prime location! We are thrilled you had an excellent experience, and we appreciate your kind remarks. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Joy W. Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: Trip was supposed to be my husband and I. Due to unforeseen circumstances it changed and it was my niece and I. We had originally booked a room with a king sized bed. When we arrived early I asked if we could switch to a double to make the king room available for a couple who may want it instead of them getting stuck in a double. They had a double available and we even had the ability to check in early if we wanted to. They did let us know it was near the elevators. We didn't care because we were not going to be in the room very much. They even waived the early check in for us. The room was really nice and despite being on near the elevators it was actually very quiet. This was one of the best rooms I have had at any hotel and I had the best sleep too! If staying there again
Manager Response: Dear LAA_in_AJ_AZ,  Thank you for your review regarding your stay at Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. It is a pleasure to know we were able to exceed your expectations with our exceptional service and spotless accommodations. We strive to ensure every guest has a comfortable and relaxing stay, and we will enjoy sharing your compliments with our associates. You're our #1 priority, and we are committed to this promise! We will be sure to share your compliments with Sabrina and our entire team, and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Anaheim.  Joy W. Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Marriott Motel, Best Location for DLR
Summary: I had hoped for a bit more Marriott in this property however it is a motel (exterior doors).  The staff was helpful, kind, always smiling and said hello.   Because the fitness center, game room, Seattle's Best and Pizza Hut are located on the 3rd floor, the elevator can get a bit busy so pack in a bit of extra time.   For the room, there is a separate barn door for the sink from the bedroom followed with another door for the toilet and shower which is great that the sink can still be in use.  Our room had a mini-fridge as well.  The biggest negative is what you'd except from most hotels in this area and that is other room noise.  They are very loud hearing children cry right next door and loud walking all around however all rooms have earplugs if needed. The location is what
Manager Response: Dear Natalie K,  Thank you for staying at the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. We are pleased to know you loved our well-appointed accommodations, prime location, and amiable staff. We also appreciate you mentioning how much you enjoyed the plentiful food and beverage options with Pizza Hut Express®, Seattle's Best Coffee and Panera located right here at our resort. However, we hope you will accept our apologies for the noise disturbances from other guests of the hotel. We are grateful for your patience, and we hope you will come back to see us soon.   Joy W Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: Stayed 5 nights in 2 themed rooms. We had requested for interconnecting rooms but on the first night it wasn't available. We left our own bedding in the crib on the first night and requested the same crib to be moved to our interconnecting room for the rest of our stay. There was some mix up and housekeeping accidentally laundered our crib bedding. The hotel was so apologetic and returned our cleaned sheets along with a written apology in a card and a huge Mickey Mouse stuffed toy. We were very surprised and impressed with the personal touch. Front desk was very warm and friendly. Room was very clean and large. Air conditioning/ heating worked perfectly. Loved the location only 5 minutes walk to Disneyland. Plenty of food options within walking distance.  Loved our stay and
Manager Response: Dear Katriiiiiiiina,  Thank you for choosing to stay at the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. We are pleased to know you loved our considerate staff, well-appointed accommodations, and prime location. However, we are sorry for the inconvenience caused initially, but we are glad our team was able to ensure that the rest of your time with us is pleasant. Thank you once more for the honest feedback, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Joy W Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: The best part of hotel is the location...across the street from Disney. Not much to say. It is a place to rest. Nothing more. Nothing less. They were very friendly and helpful. Maybe ask for a view on the west side. The east side looks at a big nothing.
Manager Response: Dear caleblyn,  Thank you for choosing to stay at the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. We are thrilled you loved our terrific location and courteous service. It was a pleasure having you as our guest, and we look forward to welcoming you again on your next visit to our area.  Joy W Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: We stated here during two visits. Type of clientele that would typically prefer this place is someone who needs functional rooms but want to stay at a convenient location.  Pros: - Very close to Disney entrance. 5 minute walk. - Panera bread is a minute walk - Convenient location to watch fireworks - Friendly, helpful staff  Cons: - Rooms basic, on par for the price - Limited onsite dining options - Sound proofing of rooms is poor - Paid Self Parking is limited but valet was efficient - They overcharged me for extra day parking, that I’m yet to resolve, but seem to be inadvertent mistake.   Given the convenience of location, this is still our preferred hotel for return visit.
Manager Response: Dear LS183,  Thank you for choosing the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort for your stay. We are pleased to know you enjoyed our prime location and loved our affable staff. Please feel free to reach out to our front desk regarding any queries you have with the parking charges as they will be happy to assist you further. Also, we apologize for falling short in some of your expectations. We value your feedback, and we look forward to your next visit.    Joy W Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: We downgraded our usual hotel stay in Disneyland on the recommendation from a friend. Never again.  Should have stayed at Grand California like usual. This hotel/motel is the noisest place on Earth.  Just saying for what we paid, we should have stayed elsewhere.  Thin walls, loud neighbors, A/C in room rattled window.  Overall not good.  Shop around.
Manager Response: Dear Falinam,  We apologize for the disturbances from other guests and your A/C during the night. We are sorry you did not sleep well in our hotel and that if you did notify us, we failed to resolve the problem while you are here. We appreciate your feedback and hope you will stay with us again in the future.  Joy W Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: We travel to Disneyland a few times a year and have stayed up and down Harbor but this is by far my favorite hotel to stay at. The staff is superb as is the location. On our recent visit my husband happened to mention that we were celebrating our belated anniversary and the front desk sent up a sweet gift bag with sparkling cider and little gifts with a sweet card. The location is great with about a 5 minute walk to the park.  Our view is excellent being able to see all of Disneyland and DCA along with a spectacular view of the fireworks. Our room had a king bed along with a pullout couch bed. The room itself is very roomy. With a barn door to separate the bathroom area from the rest of the room. Plus the room has a large tv, coffee and refrigerator and lots of plugs with a
Manager Response: Dear 308jennab,  We wish you a belated happy anniversary! Thank you for choosing to stay at Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort and letting us know how much you liked our exceptional hospitality, graciously appointed accommodations featuring beautiful views of our surroundings, and our brilliant proximity to Disneyland. We will definitely share your compliments with our associates. Thank you once more for the kind recommendation, and we look forward to welcoming you again for another seamless experience.  Joy W. Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: The Fairfield is a quick walk to Disneyland. Check in and valet was easy and the staff were friendly. We had a themed 2 queen bed room. The pros-spacious room, clean, and we had a view of the park and fireworks from the balcony. Cons- it was noisy at night. On the day we checked out we were able to leave our car with valet so we didn’t have to move it to the Disney lot which was super helpful. If they offered breakfast packages it would be a perfect hotel. We’ll definitely consider staying here again for future visits.
Manager Response: Dear LDelima,  Thank you for the excellent review of your stay at Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. We are pleased you found our location near Disneyland to be ideal for your vacation. After a long day of rides, parades, and making memories, we love that our guests can take a short walk back to our modern rooms to relax and recharge. However, we regret not meeting some of your expectations and the noise that inconvenienced you. We are grateful for your patience and value all of your helpful feedback. It was a pleasure having you as our guest; we look forward to welcoming you and your family in the near future!  Joy W. Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: This was my first trip to Disneyland, and our family stayed at the Fairfield Inn. The location was perfect. Literally across the street from both Disneyland and California Adventure Park. So close that you can actually come back to the hotel for a pool break or nap if you need to, and head right back to the park.   The hotel staff are super friendly, there is a restaurant on the 3rd floor offering different food, snack, and drinks, and the kids loved the pool and hot tub.  The rooms were spacious and kept clean during our entire stay.   The only slight drawback was that we are a family of 5, and one of us had to sleep on the pull out bed which was extremely uncomfortable.   Would highly recommend this hotel for anyone visiting Disney!
Manager Response: Dear CDNtraveler014,  It was a pleasure welcoming you and your family to the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. We are pleased you found our location near Disneyland to be ideal for your vacation. As you rightly said, after a long day of rides, parades, and making memories, we love that our guests can take a short walk back to our modern rooms to relax and recharge. We are also happy to read you liked our cordial associates and the quality food at our on-site dining options. However, we regret not meeting some of your expectations and value your patience. Thank you for the kind recommendation. It was a pleasure having you all as our guests; we hope you can come and vacation with us again soon!  Joy W. Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: This hotel has a great location for accessing Disneyland. Our room was generally clean. Front end staff were helpful when we didn’t have any bedding for the pull-out where my son slept. However, the noise level in our room was awful. My family was awakened repeatedly by screaming children running in the corridors, and we could hear everything that occurred in neighbouring rooms. Each time a shower turned on, each conversation, each slamming door. We are truly exhausted from spending 5 nights here. At various points, we actually thought someone was in our room, as we could hear their conversations so clearly. The television for next door would turn on, and the remote would turn on ours as well. Truly exhausting. The hotel is old. The bed was mediocre. The pull-out bed was awful
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your valuable observations and for choosing us during your travels to Anaheim. We understand how important it is to be able to unwind after a long day of exploring the area, so we regret knowing your peace was disrupted by neighboring guests and that you found your mattress uncomfortable. Please accept our apologies for the frustrations this caused you, and if we were not able to address this during your stay. We encourage you to reach out to our front desk associates should the happen again, as we would have made every effort to ensure your visit was as relaxing as possible. Your feedback will be reviewed with our management team to assess ways to combat noise for future guests, as well as the individuals responsible for creating plans to upgrade our property. Your satisfaction is very important to us, and we hope for another occasion to prove our commitment to superior hospitality and accommodations.  Joy W Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: A Delight for Die-Hard Disney Fans
Summary: Honestly, one of my top picks when I want to stay as close to the magic as possible.   Please keep in mind that most of the hotels across the street from Disneyland are from Walt's era and could use some TLC. This review is based on my experience at the Fairfield Inn and I'm comparing it to the other neighboring hotels. If you want a newer hotel, you'll be spending a lot more $$$ and will be further away from the park.  I stayed here on my first solo trip to Disneyland and as a mid-30's self proclaimed Disney Princess it was exactly what I wanted. Literally less than a 5 minute walk for me to get to security at Disneyland (I'm a fast walker). It was really nice having a Panera Bread and McDonalds right out front of the hotel. You also get a great view of the fireworks at night.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us at the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. We are delighted to know you enjoyed our ideal location due to its proximity to Disneyland, along with the plentiful food and beverage options right at our resort and our well-appointed accommodations. It is our goal to deliver a great value at a fair price, and we like hearing that we have accomplished just that. We appreciate your feedback, and we look forward to your next visit.   Joy W Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: Stayed here with the wife and our 2 kids. The kids got to watch the fireworks show at Disneyland from the balcony in front of our room. The Valet guys were awesome. Everything within walking distance. Room was nice and clean with great TV options for the kids. Disneyland is directly across the street. Only thing that this hotel was missing is a bar to grab a few beers.
Manager Response: Dear trevelyon,  Thank you for staying at the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. We are delighted to know you and your family loved our cordial staff, ideal location, and well-appointed accommodations. We appreciate your feedback as we are always striving to enhance our guest experience. Thank you once more for allowing us to be of service, and we hope to have the pleasure of doing so again.   Joy W Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Clean? Not the room we stayed in...
Summary: Reading the reviews, we knew this was a lower end hotel, but within great walking distance to Disneyland.....we decided this was fine, since the hotel was said to be clean.  This was certainly not our experience. We had a premium room with two queen beds. One we won’t even use due to the amount of hair in it. The floor too is covered in hair as are a few towels. The expression, “putting lipstick on a pig,” is perfect for this dump. You can paint a wall with a Disney theme but at the end of the day, you’re paying over $300 a night for a Motel 6 experience. Can’t wait to checkout tomorrow.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for being our recent guest and for sharing about your experience. We are very disappointed to learn that we missed several opportunities to elevate your stay, and we sincerely apologize for the oversights in our routine guest room inspections. Should this happen again in the future, we encourage you to reach out to our front desk associates for our immediate attention. We would have been more than happy to address all of your concerns to ensure that your stay was as comfortable as possible. Your feedback shows that we have some room for improvement, and we will use these comments to redirect our attention going forward. We appreciate your patience as we make necessary adjustments, and we hope you will consider us on your next trip to Anaheim.  Joy W Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Couple in our 20s stayed for four full Disney days. The staff here does an amazing job given the facilities that they have to work with. Every staff interaction we had was great (except for one - more later). This whole hotel just needs a revamp. The bathrooms are truly tiny. The towels were all a little ratty. The sheets left a lot to be desired. The mini fridge and hotel phone were both older than me. But the only way to beat the location is to stay on property, where you’ll spend easily 5x as much as it costs to stay here. Our two major complaints are: (1) the WiFi doesn’t work, and Verizon doesn’t work within the motel walls, and (2) we took a break midday during one of our park days for a nap, so we put out the do not disturb magnet, and the housekeeping manager still
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  We always appreciate guest feedback as it lets us know what we are doing right, as well as improvements can be made. While we appreciate knowing how much you enjoyed our proximity to Disneyland and thoughtful service provided by our staff, we regret knowing your experience was anything less than perfect. Please accept our apologies for the difficulties you had with accessing our WiFi and for the housekeeping service issues you encountered. Your concerns will be reviewed with our team to ensure that we redirect our room inspection procedures and remain consistent with our standards going forward. We will also make note on our future plans to upgrade our property, so thank you again for all of your helpful comments. We hope you will allow us to serve you better on your next trip to Anaheim, and we wish you all the best with your travels.  Joy W Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Location is good and you pay for it because the rest is VERY basic.
Summary: Its located amongst the closest non Disney Hotels like Camelot and the Howard Johnson and thats really the only reason the price is so high and the only reason you would stay here.  Put this hotel another mile from Disneyland and they would struggle to get a quarter of the price they charge. The rooms are sooo small with thin walls ,have no sink in the bathroom.  They've had a cheap freshen up but its a basic Motor Inn standard accomodation. There is a very functional 3rd floor area with Pizza and cheap breakfast items and some alcohol but theres no bar or restaurant really to speak of. All of this is nice if your saving money but at the room rate we payed I expected much more. The pool is fenced of in the middle of the car park.   Knowing whats there I would have stayed a
Manager Response: Dear thedude7474,  First and foremost, we want to thank you for being our guest and taking the time to give us your feedback.your loyalty We are glad you were able to be close to the park while you were visiting; however, we sincerely apologize for not meeting your expectations. We are known for our exceptional service and attention to detail, and we are disappointed this was not your experience. Your comments will be shared with our management team. We hope you will give us another opportunity to make a better impression.  Joy W. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel over half a dozen times. The reason we continue to return is location/proximity to Disneyland, and the hotel itself is simple but clean. There is a Pizza Hut/Seattle best coffee on 3rd floor of hotel as well as an outdoor swimming pool and hot tub. Parking is $18.00 a day. If you are looking for a simple hotel without all the Disney hype, and a short walk to the park, this is the place to stay. There are many choices for breakfast right around the hotel as well.
Manager Response: Dear 486deanm,  Thank you for making Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort your home away from home. We are pleased to learn that our location near Disneyland makes us a preferred choice. We are also glad to know you enjoyed the plentiful food and beverage options with Pizza Hut Express®, Seattle's Best Coffee and Panera located right here at our resort. It was a pleasure having you as our guest, and we look forward to seeing you and your family again soon.  Joy W. Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel twice when traveling to Disneyland.  For the price you can't beat how close it is.  Rooms are fully remodeled and clean.  I especially appreciate that there is no carpet.  Easy to get in and out of in the morning and although there is no restaurant or breakfast its right behind a Panera and McDonalds.
Manager Response: Dear jennifersR4720RP,  Thank you for returning to stay at the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort and for letting us know how much you enjoyed our spotless accommodations and that you found us to be of great value. We are also happy knowing you liked our easy accessibility and appreciate all of your valuable feedback. Thank you once more for the kind rating, and we hope to see you again soon.  Joy W Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: We had a great stay at this property and here are some of the things we liked.  We booked our week with a third party agency and had some hiccups along the way, and when we arrived there was yet another issue.  But Tamara at the front desk was pleasant, reassuring and empowered to make us happy on the spot.  She quickly resolved our concern to our full satisfaction, which was great.  Also the free wifi at this property actually works well, the elevator cars are right there when you need them, and the pool area is situated such that it is in the sun all day, though there are tree shaded areas as well.  Such a nice pool area!  And this property is only a 5 minute walk to the front gates of Disneyland.  There's also a market on the 3rd floor with a Pizza Hut express and we found
Manager Response: Dear Dale6284,  What a pleasure to read your excellent review about your time at Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. Thank you for mentioning that our considerate service, convenient location, and appetizing Pizza Hut enhanced your stay. We are thrilled you had an impeccable experience. Tamara will be happy to hear your compliments. We appreciate you choosing us, and we would love to welcome you back the next time you are in the area.   Joy W. Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: This is the second time we have stayed here. Very very clean. Staff are friendly. Close to Disneyland 7 minutes walk. McDonalds is on the door step. Other good restaurants in the area. Cheesecake Factory is about 30 minutes walk or 5 minute drive. Target is about 10 minutes drive. Loved our stay highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear DWPAussie,  Thank you for the kind words about your most recent visit to Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. We believe in the beauty of the familiar and the pleasure of getting exactly what you expect. It is a pleasure to treat our guests like family throughout their stay, and we are delighted to know you loved our ideal location and cordial staff. Thank you again for continually making us your home away from home. We appreciate the recommendation and look forward to your next stay, and until then, we wish you safe travels.  Joy W. Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: This is a great hotel if your main reason to stay is to have easy access to the Disneyland parks. It is less than a ten minute walk to the front gates (about a 15 walk to Downtown Disney) and has a couple restaurants on site or a short walk away. The front end staff are very friendly and helpful as well and you will always be greeted, whether you are coming or going into the hotel.  As for the hotel itself, there are a few downsides. Unfortunately there was a smell coming from the AC unit in the room. This was blowing on us our first night which made for a very uncomfortable sleep and both of us woke up with scratchy throats and a smell in the room. When I asked the front desk, they did send someone up to help ensure the filters were working properly which was helpful for a
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for highlighting the things you enjoyed about your experience, as well as areas where improvement is needed. Your feedback gives us the information we need to continuously improve upon our services, so we are grateful to know where attention is needed. It is rewarding to read that you could take advantage of our ideal location for exploring the Disneyland parks, as well as local shopping and dining. Nonetheless, we are disappointed that you encountered an unpleasant smell coming from your AC unit, and that we were not able to resolve this to your complete satisfaction while you were here. Your frustrations are understandable, and we are very sorry for this oversight in our room inspection procedures. We will certainly address all of your concerns with the appropriate individuals, and we thank you for your patience. It would be our pleasure to host you again and provide the perfectly seamless and fulfilling experience you always deserve.  Joy W Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Advantages of this hotel are its proximity from the hotel to the entrance of Disneyland, closeness to McDonalds and Panera Bread, and you can rent your mobility scooter from the hotel for about $40 which is roughly $30 cheaper than renting one from Disneyland for $70.   With that being said, my husband and I were not at all pleased with the hotel and this started from before we got there. When trying to call the hotel to get general questions answered, just getting through to the front desk was frustrating. The direct phone number to the hotel has an answering system that relays your call to Marriott's (800) number so you are not connected to anyone who is physically at the hotel that can answer your hotel location specific questions. We figured out eventually that you'll need
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share about your recent visit. We are truly disappointed to read your feedback, as providing superior service and accommodations are very important to us. Please accept our apologies if we failed to offer clear information regarding our incidental and parking payment policy, as well as the difficulties you had in your guest room. It is our intention and expectation that we are clear and up front with guests with all of the information we provide, and we will address this with the appropriate individuals to avoid any misunderstanding going forward. Thank you for your patience, and we hope you will consider giving us another opportunity to exceed every expectation for a perfect stay.  Joy W Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Overall Very Happy With our Stay
Summary: On our previous trips to Disneyland we had stayed at Disney hotels (The Disneyland hotel and the Grand Californian) but this trip we were doing on a lower budget so selected this hotel on the recommendation of a friend.  Overall we were very happy with our choice (my adult daughter and myself). The good: - we requested and paid for early check-in and the room was ready when we arrived - front desk staff and valet staff were very welcoming - we asked for a quiet location and were given room 311 which was very quiet and located on the same level as the coffee shop (super convenient) - the room was CLEAN and comfortable.  Loved that there was no carpet - feels so much cleaner.  Plenty of hot water.  Cleaning staff was wonderful our entire trip.  Beds are on the firm side and my
Manager Response: Dear Bev H,  Thank you for your detailed review about your stay at the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. With our courteous service, comfortable accommodations, and convenient location we are thrilled that you and your daughter had a pleasant experience with us. However, we are sorry for the issues you encountered with your bill but are glad that our front desk associates resolve it to your satisfaction. We appreciate your business and look forward to your next stay.  Joy W Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: Really nice hotel for a 3 star property. Friendly staff, check in and out no problem. Concierge very helpful. Location is brilliant and close to everything you need around here - ie Disneyland! Room is older, but a great size, well appointed and very comfortable. Elevators were fast all the time. 3 star, but that's fine. Shower water pressure not that great, however. Very comfortable beds - slept well. Didn't eat at the hotel so can't comment on the food. Pool area gets packed in the day - get there early. Lots of restaurants close by within walking distance.
Manager Response: Dear Lachlan72,  Thank you for staying with us at the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. We appreciate you mentioning our devoted associates, impeccable service, and that our location for perfect for your needs. We couldn't be more pleased that you had a relaxing stay and that you enjoyed the comforts of your room as well as the in-room amenities we provide. We value you as a guest and hope that you will choose to stay with us whenever your travels bring you this way.  Joy W Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Great location next to entrance to Disneyland
Summary: This is a perfect location to the entrance of Disneyland. The staff are welcoming and friendly and the room have been updated and are clean. It is a great value for the money. Convenient having Panera and McDonalds close by for the morning.
Manager Response: Dear captzenon,  Thank you for taking the time to share that your stay at Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort was perfect in every way and that our ideal location near Disneyland was convenient for enjoying all that Anaheim has to offer. Your positive words about our friendly staff and well-kept accommodations were a pleasure to read. We appreciate you mentioning how much you enjoyed the plentiful food and beverage options such as Panera located right here at our resort. It was our pleasure hosting you, and we hope to be your home whenever you are in the area.  Joy W Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: The hotel is clean, staff are friendly and the location is right across the road (a 7 min walk) from Disneyland which makes it a perfect location to stay. Go to the parks in the morning, back for a swim in the middle of the day and back again for a nighttime visit out of the heat. The only downsides would be the flooring is vinyl laminate so you hear every footstep and every dropped item from above you. And after a 14 hour flight and arriving early there was a charge to get into a room before nominated check in time even though there was obviously a room ready. It was worth the cost to freshen up before heading to the parks but not sure how they can say  "your room isn't ready but for $65 dollars you can check into a room".
Manager Response: Dear Terri P,  Thank you for the excellent review of your stay at Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. We are pleased you liked our cordial associates and relaxing pool and found our location near Disneyland to be ideal for your plans. After a long day of rides, parades and making memories, we love that our guests can take a short walk back to our rooms to relax and recharge. However, we are sorry for not meeting some of your expectations and the noise from our other guests and the inconvenience this caused. We appreciate your patience and helpful feedback. It was a pleasure having you as our guest; we hope you can come and vacation with us again soon!  Joy W. Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: AMAZING Customer service and Great Location- across the street from Disney!
Summary: We normally stay with this hotel anytime we go to Disneyland because of the great location (across the street- down the block). Their customer service is always outstanding (Special Thanks to Tamara!) and it helps that they're centrally located next to several different restaurants. They have a Panera Bread right in front of the hotel, which makes getting breakfast a breeze. There is a Domino's Pizza on their 3rd Floor, as well as Seattle's Best Cafe. McDonalds and Mimi's Cafe is also located right next door! They have a great pool and jacuzzi combo right in front of the hotel. The rooms are very clean and the house keeping staff is very mindful and sweet. They offer free valet parking, however, the parking fee is $10/night- still very reasonable! You are also able to watch the
Manager Response: Dear bwbsmom,  Wishing you a very happy birthday once more! Thank you for the kind words about your most recent visit to Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. We believe in the beauty of the familiar and the pleasure of getting exactly what you expect. We are elated to know that you enjoyed our ideal location, considerate staff, and the plentiful food and beverage options. It is a pleasure to treat our guests like family throughout their stay, and we will be sure to share your review with Tamara and all of our associates. Thank you again for continually making us your home away from home. We look forward to your next stay, and until then, we wish you safe travels.  Joy W. Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: Perfect location for our trip to Disneyland.  We were just a short walk to the entrance to Disneyland and California Adventure.   Much more reasonable than the Disney owned properties (2 nights for the price of 1).  We arrived around 11AM and were able to check in right away, the valet, bellhop and front desk staff were all so friendly and helpful.   The room is decorated with Disney backgrounds.  The room was clean and comfortable.   Had a mini fridge for our water. There is a marketplace in the hotel and a Panera at the end of the driveway. At night, we were able to see the fireworks from the balcony outside our room.   I will definitely stay here next time we visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Martr619,  Thank you for the excellent review of your stay at Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. We are pleased you found our location near Disneyland to be ideal for your vacation. After a long day of rides, parades and making memories, we love that our guests can take a short walk back to our modern rooms to relax and recharge. We are also delighted to know you were impressed with our entire team. It was our pleasure accommodating you, and we hope you will make Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort your home away from home whenever your travels bring you to Anaheim! We look forward to your next visit.  Joy W Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Brilliant hotel just across from Disney
Summary: We were greeted by a really friendly receptionist that made sure we had our room request. The rooms are fantastic value and clean and modern. They were well equipped with a free safe and toiletries.   The hotel is a short walk across the road from Disneyland and fireworks can be seen from the balconies. There is fresh flavoured water in reception for you to fill your water bottles free of charge  and a well stocked shop.  For a cheap breakfast McD’s is just at the entrance to the hotel. I would highly recommend this hotel and it’s position!
Manager Response: Dear traceowe18,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us at the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. It is a pleasure to know our convenient location, well-appointed accommodations, and courteous staff exceeded your expectations for a flawless stay. We appreciate your recommendation, and we look forward to our next opportunity to provide you with another perfect experience.  Joy W Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: Great location next to Disneyland!  Very clean and well maintained hotel. My room was roomy with very simple decor.  Big plus is the third floor...Pizza Hut and a small arcade for the kids.  Pool is nothing special but at least they have one... parking is tight but they have valet service.  Panera and McDonald's are on the same lot.
Manager Response: Dear 394franm,  Thank you for your terrific review of Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. We are delighted to learn that you appreciated our well-kept property, excellent rooms, and easy access to Disneyland. Thank you again for choosing us, and we look forward to welcoming you back to our area.  Joy W Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: The hotel was in an excellent location walking distance to the parks.  Our room was nice, clean and reasonably sized, but lacked the extra amenities you expect from its star rating.  We could see the fireworks every night from our balcony. There was a shop with a pizza bar but no real restaurant or breakfast buffet, however plenty of restaurants in the immediate area
Manager Response: Dear sharon a,  Thank you for the wonderful review of your stay at Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. We are pleased you found our location near Disneyland to be ideal for your vacation. We are also glad to know you enjoyed the fantastic fireworks from your well-kept room. It was a pleasure having you as our guest; we hope you can come and vacation with us again soon.  Joy W. Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: The hotel is only .5 miles to Disneyland - super easy walk!  We were in two rooms that each had two double beds that were adjoining on the 7th Floor.  Beds are firm, but comfortable.  You can tell the bathrooms were recently fixed up with paint and caulk, but it seems a little dated.  Faux hardwood floors throughout which is actually nice to have.  Valet is fast.  We've stayed here twice and would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Miss_Thao,  Thank you for returning to stay with us at the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. We are happy to read our convenient location with proximity to Disneyland and other attractions, was perfect for your plans. It is also nice to know you liked our valet service, the decor of our accommodations, and the comforts of our bed. Moreover, we appreciate your valuable feedback, as it helps us to improve our overall guest experience. It is always a pleasure hosting you, and we look forward to your next visit with us.  Joy W Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: We recently stayed at this hotel for 3 nights during our visit to Disneyland Resort for our daughters birthday.   We had a wonderful experience that started from the time we checked in. At check-in the staff noted it was my daughters birthday and that she was wearing a Marvel shirt. When we returned to our room later that night they had left a customized birthday card and Spider-Man mug. Very sweet.   The room was very sizable, clean and very well maintained. Probably the best Fairfield I’ve been to. We would definitely return and stay again.   Pros: -Friendly and attentive staff -Closer to Disneyland than Disney’s own hotels -Large well maintained rooms themed to Disney -Laundry on each floor -3rd floor market and food court  Cons: - $24 per day parking - Breakfast for a fee
Manager Response: none

Summary: This has been a reliable, consistently clean and comfortable hotel for the past 5 years. We happily frequent it whenever we can find a good price (sometimes it's very competitive with neighboring hotels, sometimes its far more expensive). We love the location, the very friendly and helpful staff, and the quality of the rooms.
Manager Response: Dear kmloughran,  Thank you for the kind words about your most recent visit to Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. We believe in the beauty of the familiar and the pleasure of getting exactly what you expect. We appreciate you mentioning our stellar location, amiable staff, and well-appointed accommodations. It is a pleasure to treat our guests like family throughout their stay, and we will be sure to share your review with all of our associates. Thank you again for making us your preferred choice, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Joy W. Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: Nothing bad to say about this hotel Clean well maintained room, lots of storage space, nice wooden flooring  Location within 5 minutes walk of Disney security, slightly longer if waiting at crosswalk on Harbor blvd Great value would highly recommend
Manager Response: Dear DKSManchester,  Thank you for choosing us and for taking the time to post a review. We are delighted you had a magical stay at Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort, located right across the street from Disneyland® Resort. We are elated you loved our stellar location and well-maintained accommodations. Thank you once more for recommending us to future guests, and we look forward to your next visit.  Joy W. Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Good Place to Stay Near Disneyland
Summary: My family of 5 (4 adults + 1 child, age 5) stayed in a themed deluxe queen room with sleeper chair. It was spacious enough for the 5 of us, especially since most of our stay we were at the parks or the pool rather than in our room. The accommodations are pretty basic, and there is no microwave in the room (there is a refrigerator and a coffeemaker, though). There is filtered water in the gym on the 3rd floor, which was nice to have access to; additionally, the staff keeps lemon water and lime water dispensers in the lobby. It's so refreshing to drink a few cups of that water after walking from the parks in the heat!   The rooms are clean--I love the hardfloor instead of carpet. There is a sink outside of the toilet/bath room, which also has a door to close off from the bed-room.
Manager Response: Dear Shannon K,  Thank you for choosing to stay at the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. We are delighted to know our ideal location, cordial staff, and well-maintained accommodations made for an exceptional stay. We value your detailed feedback, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Joy W Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: If you read reviews of this hotel you may get a mixed signal. If you are looking for "luxury" it isn't this. But if you need somewhere within walking distance of Disney that is quick, convenient, and officiant I'd say this is the best value. We used the room to conk out on after 10 mile walks through Disney in 3 days. That was all.   The pros: Quite, even though we were on the ground floor and facing the pool. Bed was comfortable and the AC worked great. Check-in was easy and fast. Rooms have fridges and safes. TV was able to connect to Netflix. Disney theme was cool. Panera and McDonalds on the way to Disneyland if you want to avoid the prices at the park in the morning. Hot Tub in the pool area was awesome. Could tell it was well maintained because when I first got in the
Manager Response: Dear Morgan R,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us at the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. It is a pleasure to know that you found our location near Disneyland to be ideal for your vacation, After a long day of rides, parades and making memories, we love that our guests can take a short walk back to our modern rooms to relax and recharge. However, we regret that you were disappointed with the cost of our parking. Our fees are competitively priced and posted on our website so guests can have this information before booking with us. We value all of your feedback, and we hope to see you again the next time you visit the area.  Joy W Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: We just had the pleasure of meeting Bernie B who checked us into the hotel.  There was an issue with the rate and she was able to fix the reservation, get us in earlier then expected and surprised us with a room with Firework view! Her calm demeanor and warm smile was the perfect welcome to Anaheim!
Manager Response: Dear Aaron94109,  Thank you for the outstanding review! We are delighted to know how much you enjoyed your stay and that our staff provided you with excellent service. Thank you again for acknowledging our front desk associate for a job well done. Bernie is a perfect example of the passionate and dedicated spirit of hospitality that we value. We will be sure to share your comments with her. It was our pleasure hosting you at Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Joy W Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Good place to bunk for a Disney visit
Summary: The Fairfield Inn is very convenient to Disney. It is walkable for easy return to your room for a break and lots of restaurants near by. Room on the 9th floor had great views and made the fireworks very easy to view but on the con side was a little annoying to try to put a kid to bed. The room did  supply ear plugs but we didn't try that. We just worked around the bedtime and used white noise. Nice to have a refrigerator in the room to store drinks to bring to the parks. Room and amenities was pretty average though and shower not that great.  Overall not too bad if you want the convenience of visiting the parks in the area.
Manager Response: Dear MDMom2012,   Thank you for reviewing your stay. We are glad you chose us for your visit to Disneyland®, and we appreciate you mentioning how much you enjoyed our excellent accommodations and location. We hope you will accept our apologies for the noise disturbances during your stay. Our focus is on offering a calming, reliable experience, and we are disappointed this was not your experience. We are grateful for your patience, and we hope you will come back to see us soon.  Joy W. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay while visiting Disney Land
Summary: Great location, decent price, and nice ammenities.  There is a Panera sandwhich place right next to the hotel, and you can order your lunch and pick it up on your way out to Disney...awesome!!!  Disney food is way over priced and not good (personal opinion:)
Manager Response: Dear Nivamp,  Thank you for the kind words about your visit to Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. We are pleased you found our location near Disneyland to be ideal for your vacation and that you liked our affordable rates. We appreciate you recommending us to future guests and hope to welcome you back soon.  Joy W. Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Great location but the room needed help
Summary: The location is perfect for Disneyland.   Our room smelled of sewer gas.  We had to keep the bathroom door closed.  The  odor was awful when you had to go into the bathroom.  We alerted the front desk and they did nothing. If not for that it is a great location and could be great for families
Manager Response: Dear 4dgb,  Thank you for staying at our hotel and for sharing your concerns. Please accept our apologies for the inconvenience caused by maintenance issues, and for our lack of responsiveness to your concerns. The service that you described is not typical for us, and steps have been taken to ensure that this does not occur going forward. We hope you will choose us again so we can provide you with a more satisfactory stay.  Joy W. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Walkable to Disneyland But Room Quality Below Average
Summary: The distance to Disneyland is great. It allows you to get to the park early and to head back for a break in the afternoon. Room cleaning staff did a great job of keeping the room clean each day. However, the quality of the hotel room itself is below par for today's standard. The door opens to a balcony that is not secured to guests only. And you can hear the conversation of people walking pass the front of the room. As the same for the bathroom with loud plumbing noise when the neighboring room uses the faucet of the bathtub. Toilet tank leaked water. Also, the room is small without sofa or chair so it is tiring with nowhere to sit other than the beds. No microwave in the room, so it would suck if you don't stay on the same floor as the PizzaHut express with public microwaves.
Manager Response: Dear Cell U,  Thank you for choosing us and sharing your experience. Although it is a pleasure to see that our walk-able location served you well, we apologize for falling short of the standard you should always expect from us. We appreciate you bringing your concerns to our attention so that we may take corrective action to improve for our valued guests. Please consider giving us another opportunity to regain your trust the next time you are in the area.  Joy W. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Wonderful place to stay for Disney vacation
Summary: My family and I stayed at this hotel for our Disneyland holiday. It is right across the street from Disneyland and we had a view of the park from our 9th floor room. We could see the fireworks right off the balcony in the evening. The room was very clean and the bed was comfortable. The location was convenient with Panera right in the parking lot and McDonald’s next door for meal options out of the park.  What impressed me most was that the staff went over and above to help us when our daughter lost her Minnie Mouse. We were checking out and she lost it on the way down. We had to catch our shuttle so we unfortunately had to leave. As we were walking down the sidewalk, one of the employees (I wish I had caught his name) came running towards us with our daughter’s beloved Minnie.
Manager Response: Dear 780sunseeker,  Thank you for the excellent review of your stay at Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. We are pleased you found our location near Disneyland to be ideal for your vacation, and we appreciate you mentioning our considerate staff for their warm behavior. After a long day of rides, parades and making memories, we love that our guests can take a short walk back to our modern rooms to relax and recharge. It was a pleasure having you as our guest; we hope you can come and vacation with us again soon!  Joy W. Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: This hotel was great. From check in through the whole stat. Its a 7 min walk to disneyland. Rooms are nice, roomy. Food is nearby. Overall great stay. The parking is a little tight but they have valet as well. There is a pizza hut on the third floor. We stayed on the first floor and the hotel is quite. Panera is in the same parking lot for quick breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear badpiggy75,  Thank you for choosing the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. We are delighted you loved our comfortable accommodations, ideal location near Disneyland as well as the plentiful food and beverage options with Pizza Hut Express, Seattle's Best Coffee and Panera located right here at our resort. It was our pleasure hosting you, and we hope you will choose us again.  Joy W Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: Rooms are nicely appointed, spacious, with full kitchen.  Rooms are quiet, beds are very comfortable.  Walking distance to Disneyland.  Right next door to the Convention center.  Staff courtous and helpful.  Will definetly book again.
Manager Response: Dear Carol V,  Thank you for staying at the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. It is a pleasure to know our well-appointed accommodations, ideal location, and hospitable staff exceeded your expectations for a perfect experience. We loved having you as our guest and look forward to hosting you again.  Joy W Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: I primarily booked this room for two reasons: 1) I was looking for a Marriott branded hotel due to my frequent stays in Marriot hotels, and 2) I was looking for something in close walking distance to the theme parks.  I chose the Fairfield Inn by Marriott Anaheim Resort and was pleasantly surprised.  The room was of average size and was nicely decorated.  There was even some Disney inspired theming in the room.  Although I couldn't tell from the initial photos of saw, the facility is more of a typical motel than hotel, entering the room from an external walkway rather than through internal halls.  Parking was an additional charge and was the same price if you did self park vs valet.  Due to limited parking valet was the preferred method during the end of my stay.  The room was
Manager Response: Dear christopherv915,  Thank you for choosing us and for taking the time to post a review. We are delighted you had a magical stay at Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort, located right across the street from Disneyland® Resort. It was our pleasure accommodating you, and are glad you loved our cordial staff and convenient location. We look forward to your next visit.  Joy W. Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: The staff were amazing, from the valet person all the way to the cleaning lady. They were helpful, nice and attentive.  My room was not great. There was a constant ringing noise, due to my room door not sealing properly. The bed was extremely firm and the pillows were small and uncomfortable. The bathroom seemed dated.
Manager Response: Dear cascer11,   Thank you for choosing us and also for your review. We want to apologize for not exceeding your expectations during your visit. We appreciate your comments on how much you enjoyed our thoughtful hospitalty, and we hope you will come back so we can provide you with the exceptional experience for which we are known. It was our pleasure hosting you, and we look forward to your next visit.  Joy W Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Location is great, rooms are just okay
Summary: We had a room (105) right in the front of the hotel where the cars drive in for check in, it was a very noisy room. The air conditioner was so loud that when it kicked on, it woke me up. The beds are comfy. The best part of this hotel was the location, easily walkable to Disneyland with a Panera bread and McDonalds very close. The bad part is 24.00 per day to park a car. I would stay here if the price was good, but there are a lot of better places for the price.
Manager Response: Dear janmK2730UM,  Thank you for choosing Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort and for the kind review. It is good to know you liked the comfort our beds provide and that our location proved to be suitable to your needs. However, we regret your disappointment with our parking charges and are sorry for the noise issues you encountered. Our front desk is available 24 hours a day to resolve issues such as this, so we would have been happy to place you in another room had you alerted us. We hope you give us another chance to serve you better in the future.  Joy W. Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Great location for a Disney visit
Summary: We stayed for 2 nights on a recent trip to Disneyland. Check in was quick and easy. Bernie at the front desk was very friendly and helpful. The room was clean and spacious, but the bathroom was small. It was only 2 of us in the room so it wasn't that bad. We had a view of the Disneyland fireworks which was awesome. On the day we visited the Disney parks we walked to the Panera in the parking lot for breakfast, then walked to the park across the street. It's a very easy and quick walk so we arrived before the park opened. It was also convenient to be able to walk back to our room in the middle of the day to rest for awhile before returning to the park. I would stay here again the next time we visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear rlm_travelers,  Thank you for the excellent review of your stay at Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. We are pleased you found our location near Disneyland to be ideal for your vacation. After a long day of rides, parades and making memories, we love that our guests can take a short walk back to our modern rooms to relax and recharge. We are also glad to know you were impressed with the great service provided by Bernie. We look forward to your return visit.  Joy W. Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Perfectly good business hotel next to a theme park
Summary: This feels like a perfectly good, business hotel that has found itself next to a theme park. It is clean and efficient in a business traveler kind of way. If you show up expecting a Disney World Resort level of service and accommodation then you will probably be disappointed. They have made accommodations for people who are going to Disneyland across the street. They have a comprehensive little shop for personal items that you might need, and they sell tickets to the park and they rent mobility scooters. That’s it really. Bring your own USB chargers. Don’t spend extra on the high view, themed rooms. You can’t see the park that well unless you go out onto the outside walkway (think motel), and the theme aspect is wallpaper on one wall. There is a Panera in the parking lot, a
Manager Response: Dear todbookless,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us while you were here on a business trip. We are happy to read you liked our convenient location with proximity to Disneyland. However, we are sorry for not meeting your expectations with our level of service and accommodations. We appreciate your valuable feedback, as it helps us to improve our overall guest experience. Moreover, we also regret your disappointment with our parking charges. Thank you again for your review, and we hope to be your hotel of choice if another visit to our area is in your plans.  Joy W Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 3 nights (Thursday - Sunday).  Pros:  -close walk to DCA and Disneyland -clean, good location with nearby quick places to eat -quick house keeping response  Cons:  -front desk service -no parking (especially after 9pm, but the valet service and price was good) -AND OUR CARD KEYS KEPT GETTING DEACTIVATE/DEMAGNETIZED! WHAT'S WORST IS EACH TIME WE COMPLAIN, WE GET THE ANSWER OF "DON'T LEAVE IT NEXT TO YOUR PHONE OR KEYS. WELL WE DIDN'T AND IT STILL GOT DEMAGNETIZED. WE HAD TO KEEP GETTING NEW CARD KEYS EACH NIGHT WE STAYED. OH IT WAS LOVELY HOW THEY CHARGED US FOR NEW CARD KEYS EACH TIME.  As much we loved this hotel, the card keys issue would be the reason why I wouldn't stay here next time. It is an inconvenient to get new keys each night especially
Manager Response: Dear kuhduong,   Thank you for taking the time to share about your stay. We are always excited to receive positive comments from our guests, but we are also grateful to learn from detailed comments on how we can improve our guest experience. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you experienced with your key cards and that we did not appropriately resolve this while you were with us. As part of The Fairfield Guarantee, we hope to have another opportunity to make it right on a future visit. Thank you for choosing us, and we wish you all the best with your travels.  Joy W. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Clean but terrible parking and service
Summary: Stayed here with our daughter to visit the Disney parks.   -Great location, short walk to the park -Clean and comfy beds - we like it firm  -noise from hall was not too bad  -Parking was terrible! They say you can self park but after 7pm you have to let valet park your car since there are not enough spots for the number for rooms  -our room keys keep getting deactivated and it was a pain to get it to reset
Manager Response: Dear queenieduong,   Thank you for staying with us and for your review. It is great to know you enjoyed our wonderful location and clean, comfortable rooms. However, we apologize for the issues you experienced with parking and that your keys were not working properly. Your total satisfaction is our top priority, and we regret the inconvenience this caused. We understand your frustration, and we are grateful for your patience. We hope you will stay with us again for a more gratifying experience.  Joy W. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Room is spacious enough for 4 people. We had a great time staying.  Bed is comfortable. Just be mindful about the traffic in LA , it gets very bad during workdays. Try to leave early if you want to visit as many place as you like. Very close to Disneyland. If you just want to visit Disney, it’s perfect location.
Manager Response: Dear Kym H,  What a pleasure to read your review about your time at Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. Thank you for mentioning our spacious, comfortable accommodations and convenient location with proximity to Disneyland. We appreciate you choosing us, and we would love to welcome you back the next time you are in the area.   Joy W. Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland, but wouldn't stay here again..
Summary: The beds are very firm, we had sore backs long after we got home. We requested softer beds but were told that we'd have to pay for a pillow top.   After a long day at Disneyland we got to the hotel around 11pm with our 4 kids. The water was ICE COLD. We called the front desk and were told that they were changing a boiler. I was told the water would be warming up soon. An hour later we still had no hot water so I called again and was told that there was no eta on when it would be fixed. I requested another room and was told that no rooms in the entire hotel had hot water. They told me there was nothing they could do.   There was no microwave in the room, only the 3rd floor has them. This is standard in most hotel rooms. We had planned and brought food thinking we'd have a
Manager Response: Dear Micky2711,   Thank you for staying with us and for your review. It is great to know you enjoyed our convenient location to Disneyland. However, we apologize for the issues you experienced during your stay and that we fell short in providing the comfortable, stress-free time you deserved. Your total satisfaction is our top priority, and we regret the inconvenience this caused. We understand your frustration, and we are grateful for your patience. We hope you will stay with us again for a more gratifying experience.  Joy W. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Disney is expensive, I get it... That's why I chose this hotel and I got exactly what I paid for. I'm okay losing a night's sleep hearing traffic or having height issues because I spent the day at Disney. Would I bring kids here? Doubtedly. To be clear, there's nothing wrong at all with this hotel, but I felt uncomfortable and if Disney weren't walking distance I'd be more vocal about it too.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for sharing feedback regarding your recent experience and for choosing our hotel. It is always a pleasure to welcome guests that are traveling to Anaheim for Disneyland, and we are glad that you were able to enjoy some aspects of your visit. However, please accept our apologies for failing to provide the peaceful and relaxing stay that you deserved. Our focus is on offering a calming, reliable experience, and we are disappointed that we could not address your concerns while you were here. Your feedback will help us identify areas needing improvement, so we thank you again for letting us know. We hope to welcome you in the future so we can better deliver the outstanding visit that we are known for.  Joy W. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Long walk to anywhere except Disneyland.
Summary: My daughter and I stayed here at the beginning of May. We were here for 10 days five of which we visited Disney two of which Universal Studios and a couple of other days that we did some tours. This is an okay place if you are just doing Disneyland but if you need to catch other transportation then it's quite a walk. First of all to get any transportation for any of the things I mentioned you have to first walk out of their parking lot which will take you owe a good 10 minutes from your room at least and then you have to walk on Harbor Boulevard around all the businesses down the road down the other Road because nothing can stop in front of your hotel. This would be fine except there's no one to tell you where anything is just kind of stand over here and hope the transportation
Manager Response: Dear AnneSienna,   We are happy to know you enjoyed your time with us. However, we are sorry for the concerns with the distance from our hotel to nearby attractions and that housekeeping did not honor the do not disturb sign on your door. We always want to exceed our guest's expectations, so we are disappointed this did not happen during your visit. Your concerns have been shared with the appropriate individuals, and we are grateful for the feedback. What you experienced is not typical, and we would welcome another occasion to provide you with the seamless hospitality for which we are known.  Joy W. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We stayed 7/1-7/4, checking in was super quick. Tamara was really friendly and helpful, she even sent up my daughter a stuffed animal for her 1st birthday. Room was clean and the AC/heater worked perfect. Beds were comfy. Every staff we encountered greeted us. Walk to the park was about 7-10 mins. Pizza Hut/cafe on 3rd floor was great for a quick snack. Free water in lobby was amazing before/after Disney. Will definitely be staying again in Sept when we visit Disney next.   Only complaint was with the valet. We kept getting citation notices from valet about parking permits even though we had the sticker. It was an easy fix but annoying every morning we'd wake up the notice.
Manager Response: Dear blopez8292,  Thank you for choosing us and for taking the time to post a review. We are delighted you had a magical stay at Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort, located right across the street from Disneyland® Resort. We love knowing our guests enjoyed our excellent service, well-appointed rooms, and delicious food and beverage options with Pizza Hut Express. We are also excited to know that Tamara provided you with friendly hospitality and succeeded in surprising your daughter on her first birthday. However, we regret the inconvenience you mentioned. It was our pleasure accommodating you both, and we hope you will make us your home away from home whenever your travels bring you to Anaheim!   Joy W. Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: We stayed here two different times in the last week for a total of 3 nights.  The hotel is located practically across the street from Disneyland so location alone makes it a good location.  It's nice to be able to walk back to your room whenever you want and not have to worry about parking or driving.The staff was very friendly and helpful.    The negatives are the parking charges ($21 night), no free breakfast like most Fairfields, and the fact it's a older facility (outside room entrances).  However, the rooms were fairly quiet.
Manager Response: Dear Hokiechip,  Thank you for posting a review of your stay at Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. We are pleased you appreciated our convenient location near Disneyland, professional staff, and comfortable rooms. However, we regret your disappointment with our additional charges. We value your feedback and look forward to hosting you again.  Joy W Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Hire enough housekeeping staff to service your rooms
Summary: This hotel is fine. It’s cheap and the people are trying their best but you just can’t still be doing room service on your rooms all the way until 6 pm. If you can’t get your rooms serviced in time for guests to come back to a clean room with towels for a late afternoon nap and shower then you are understaffed. You should take the people that spend their time replying to these reviews and give them a housekeeping cart. Keep trying.
Manager Response: Dear ClayInDC,   Thank you for staying with us and for your valuable feedback. We take the cleanliness of our rooms and hotel very seriously, and we hope you will accept our apologies for the housekeeping issues you experienced during your stay. Your concerns have been shared with our associates, and we have taken proper action to prevent similar mistakes. We encourage you to give us another opportunity on your next visit to Anaheim so we can provide you with the hospitality you deserve.  Joy W. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The good part about this is it’s right across the street from Disneyland and we watched the fireworks from our 4th floor walkway, and  the room was clean. But it’s a very old hotel and that shows. I will only come back if absolutely necessary.
Manager Response: Dear DebiDebi2019,   We're thrilled our wonderful location near Disneyland was perfect for your plans! However, we were disappointed to read that you were not completely satisfied with your stay. We appreciate the feedback and will use it when considering future renovations. We hope to see you the next time you are in Anaheim.  Joy W. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Yes you’re less than 10 minute walk to Disney.  McDonald’s and Panera at the entrance Group reservation staff very accommodating throughout the process. Rates were fair as was parking Nice rooms, good elevator service, efficient and friendly staff Pool worked out well.
Manager Response: Dear nmb626,  Thank you for choosing us and for taking the time to post a review. We are delighted you had a magical stay at Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort, located right across the street from Disneyland® Resort. We are glad to know you loved our comfortable accommodations and that you were impressed by the service provided to you by our staff. It was our pleasure accommodating you and your family, and we hope you will make Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort your home away from home whenever your travels bring you to Anaheim. We look forward to your next visit.  Joy W. Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: Felt the location was awesome! So close to disneyland, fireworks can be watched right from your bedroom. However, felt the room itself was a little dated. Also, didn't feel like it was spotless either. I know a lot of kids and family's running through the hotel, however, felt like I should always be wearing shoes in the room and such. Front desk staff was great as well! So friendly! Didn't feel the same friendly attitude from the valet service though. Also, parking fills up so QUICK, you will be forced to valet if you try and park after 4PM. Those few little things add up to make your stay not the greatest.
Manager Response: Dear Curtis K,   We are happy to know you enjoyed your time with us. However, we are sorry for the concerns with housekeeping and that you felt your room was dated. Your concerns have been shared with the appropriate individuals, and we are grateful for the feedback and we would welcome another occasion to provide you with a perfect experience.  Joy W. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Friendly staff, clean, but also dated
Summary: The price and location were the reasons we picked this location.  It definitely is an easy walk to Disney.   We were given an upgraded room but I'm not sure what upgraded means.   It wasn't bigger than a normal hotel room nor did it have a sitting area like most suites have.   We did have a small fridge but no microwave.  Staff was very friendly and helpful.   It had a dated feel but it wasn't worn down.  I think the biggest disappointment was the pool.  It was small and not one you would want to just lounge by at the end of the day.  I was impressed with how clean things were.
Manager Response: Dear Funfamtime,  Thank you for your review regarding your stay at Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. We are pleased to read that you liked our convenient location and affordable rates. We also appreciate you letting us know our team went over and above during your visit. However, we regret not meeting your expectations with our pool and with the upgrade you got. We encourage you to give us another opportunity on your next visit to Anaheim so we can provide you with the stay you deserve.  Joy W. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Stayed here with my girlfriend and two kids. For a big hotel it was quiet, clean and the pool was pretty much empty everyday which our kids loved. Room was lovely and the staff were amazing, they even had balloons and sweets sent to our room for our kids on their respective birthdays. So close to Disney parks that we could walk to the main entrance in 5 mins. Fab location if you want to be close to the action of Disney. Would definitely go again.
Manager Response: Dear Danrw38,  Thank you for being our guest at Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort. It is our pleasure knowing you had an excellent stay and that our team was successful in making your kids birthday memorable. Your positive comments about our location near Disney, comfortable rooms, and friendly associates are greatly appreciated. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back on your next visit.  Joy W Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary: Very nice hotel , close disney only 6 mins walk .Definitely will come back again .  We love it cos it’s so close the entrance. And cheaper than Disneyland hotel . And close to restaurants , little kids and whole  family enjoy  the trip
Manager Response: Dear yohiclapham,   We are delighted you chose Fairfield Inn Anaheim Resort during your family Disney trip. Our ideal location provides our guests with an effortless way to enjoy all that Anaheim has to offer. We are pleased to know you could take advantage of this, and we look forward to welcoming you all back soon.  Joy W Guest Relations Manager Fairfield by Marriott Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Friendly Staff and Cool Rooms With a Disney Flair
Summary: My son and I stayed here for a 7 day Spring Break trip to Disneyland in March. I was a little nervous after booking this hotel because I had read in other reviews about how noisy the hotel was. We stayed on the eighth floor and during our whole time there we never heard anybody else.  We found the staff to be very accommodating and friendly. Anytime we had any issues they solved them right away. They were even very nice about mailing my iPad back to me after I accidentally left in in the safe after we checked out. While I didn’t like that we had to wait till 4 pm to check-in, I did like that they had our ticket package ready and allowed us to leave our suitcases there so that we could go right to the parks while waiting for our room to be ready.  We had a deluxe room and I loved
