Not to mention being given two separate beds.  (Honeymoon?!?!)  The rooms seemed paperthin with the screaming child next door.  All night it screamed.   The bathroom was tiny as in I stepped out of the shower
Manager Response: Thank you for submitting this review. We appreciate your feedback and are concerned about your experience. We have sent you a private message requesting your contact information so we can reach out directly.

Summary Heading: THE place to stay if not at a Disney hotel
Summary: For anyone wanting a great place to stay within walking distance of Disneyland, the Fairfield Inn is a no brainer.  I can't overstate how fantastic this hotel is for families - including grandparents in a connecting room in this case. From the moment we stepped off the SNA Shuttle van, we were met by bellman Kurt who handled all our bags from van to room.  Christina at the front desk couldn't have been more pleasant or more helpful. It is obvious that the employees and management of this hotel understand the hospitality business because employees were always there willing to help with a smile on their faces. Rudy helped us with the scooters. Employees in the gift shop and on the 3rd floor Pizza Hut Express were top notch. Housekeeping had their work cut out with our grandkids
Manager Response: Thank you for your fantastic review! We're delighted to read that every aspect of your stay was top-notch and thrilled that our team could provide you with exceptional service throughout the visit. We appreciate your recommendation and truly hope to welcome you back to the happiest place on earth again soon!

Summary: We are on our 3rd night staying here and the Fairfield has been perfect. Really clean and newly renovated rooms. Cheap cafe on 3rd floor with good yogurt parfaits for breakfast. Steps from Disneyland. Clean pool. And really quiet at night--good ambience overall.
Manager Response: Thank you for your generous review! We're thirlled to hear you enjoyed your dining experience and hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: Great spot.  Very easy to get to breakfast spots and fast walk to Disney just a block away.  Nice pool and hot tub.  I like the fridge in the room.  There is a pizza hut on the third floor, ice and drink machines.  Elevators are slow however so use the stairs if your not hauling luggage.
Manager Response: Thank you for this wonderful review, Melinda. We're very happy to hear that you enjoyed our great location, as well as your room, amenities and our pool and hot tub. We appreciate your feedback on the elevators as well and we hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back again in the future on your next visit to Disney.

Summary: We stayed for 3 nights (April 20 to April 23) and had a wonderful stay. Every employee was pleasant and went out of there way to make sure we were pleased. I thought the newly decorated rooms were very nice. I like the wood floors instead of carpet. It was an easy walk to Disneyland and it's nice having Panera in the same parking lot with McDonald's next door. I do believe this is my new favorite Disneyland place to stay. We had a great view of the fireworks.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your experience with us! It's great to hear that you encountered such friendly service and enjoyed our convenient location. What a treat to experience a view of the fireworks! We're honored to be your hotel of choice for Disneyland getaways.

Summary: Overall my family's stay at Fairfield Inn was awesome, close proximity to disneyland and relatively cheap options to eat around. Staff was pleasant and rooms although were a bit small we're clean and aesthetically pleasing.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review, Adrian! We're delighted to hear that your family enjoyed our close proximity to the park as well as our excellent customer service. We truly look forward to our next opportunity to welcome you back for another seamless stay.

Summary: Stayed here for a Blizzcon Convention and then to Disneyland.  The staff were great, breakfast was good.  The pool was kept up and the rooms were clean and quiet.  You could even see the fireworks.  Location is only a mile from the convention center, and right across from Disney.  We got a super shuttle from LAX and did not need a car!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Eric. We're thrilled you enjoyed our staff and your dining experience. We hope you'll return again for another brilliant stay.

Summary: This hotel was recommended to us by our travel agent.  We wanted to stay somewhere within TRUE walking distance to Disneyland - and we were not disappointed.    Rooms are ok;  nothing fancy.  But they were clean and the hotel itself was quiet for the part.  We did get an unwelcome wake up one morning around 6am when concierge knocked on the wrong door.  The front desk was extremely apologetic and gave us a $25 gift card to spend at the shop on site.    McDonald's also on site and after awhile you do get sick of it but it did the trick for morning breakfasts on our way to the parks early.    We had a great stay here and it served our needs for our mostly Disney vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We're happy to hear you enjoyed yourself and our staff could help make things right. We hope you'll return again for another magical visit.

Summary Heading: Great location but room is just ok
Summary: You cannot beat how close this hotel is to Disneyland. Right across the street and very easy walk to the park. However, the rooms are just ok. We were on the 9th floor in one of their "renovated" rooms. I'm not sure what that meant. We had a 2 queen bed room and the one I slept in was squeaky when I tossed and turned and the mattress was uncomfortable. We did take the afternoon off from Disney and went to the hotel pool. Plenty of towels and chaise lounges. I don't think the pool was heated though. The hotel staff was always friendly when we walked through the doors. Because it is a Fairfield Inn, I assumed it included breakfast... it does not!! Breakfast is available for an additional fee.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your experience with us. While we're thrilled to hear that our team was friendly and helpful, we're disappointed to hear that your room did not meet your expectations. We truly hope to have another opportunity to welcome you back for the 5-star stay that you deserve.

Summary: So my family and I have been wanting to stay at this hotel for some time but the issue is that they are unable to accommodate my large family in a single suite. But this most recent visit was just my wife and I for her birthday. So we arrived on our check in date and being a Marriott Rewards that allows for me to request an early check in. We were able to pre-check in and we're told we would receive a text when our room was ready. No such text was ever received. So kind of a less than stellar start, as we really wanted to check in a relax for a bit.  As for the aesthetics, the outer appearance is pleasing, clean, etc. They are doing some construction/remodeling on the first floor but it didn't impact us at all. The staff were kind, professional looking (clean shave, uniforms
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review, Johnny! We're delighted to hear that our team was friendly and professional, and that you found your room to be clean and comfortable. We're also delighted to hear that you enjoyed our close proximity to the park. Should you return to Anaheim, we hope to have another opportunity to welcome you back for another great stay.

Summary Heading: Perfect hotel in the PERFECT location!
Summary: This hotel is directly across the street from Disneyland.  It took maybe 5 minutes to walk from our hotel room door to the Disney gate.  We even had a view of space mountain from our hotel room.  McDonalds and IHOP are right next door with a Panera Bread in the parking lot of the hotel.  This Fairfield has just been renovated so the rooms are great! They even have hard wood floors which makes the room feel "cleaner".  The staff was so nice and helpful at check-in.
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing review, Karen. We're thrilled you enjoyed our convenient location. We hope to welcome you again for another brilliant stay!

Summary: We love this hotel. It is about one block to the entrance of the park. It does not offer breakfast but does give you a 10% coupon for McDonalds which is right next door. There is also a Panera's in the same parking lot as the hotel. The hotel is undergoing a remodel in the lobby and the rooms.We missed the more Disney themed rooms but we got over it quickly. This hotel is  definitely the place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review! We're so happy to hear that you enjoyed our close proximity to the park as well as our nearby dining options. We look forward to welcoming you back for another seamless visit in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Hotel across the street from DISNEYLAND!!
Summary: This hotel is across the street and down a couple of blocks from the entrance to DISNEYLAND & CALIFORNIA ADVENTURE LAND.  Great location, the kids loved the pool.  Lots of eating places within easy walking distance.  The hotel had nice rooms with comfy beds. It was about 30-45 minutes from John Wayne Airport (Ontario) so travel was easy in and out. And, we watched the Disneyland FIREWORKS from the walkway balcony outside our rooms.  We were there over Oregon spring break and they had fireworks every night!
Manager Response: Thank you for your generous review! We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed our convenient location and hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary Heading: Great family hotel within a 5 minute walk to Disneyland
Summary: Our family of 5 just stayed here for 3 nights.  The staff was most helpful and the room had just been redecorated.  The bed was a little hard, but after 2 long days in the parks, we still slept very well.  Our room had views of the fireworks which was an added bonus.  The rooms are slightly noisy but again, we were so tired that it really didn't matter.  We'd stay here maybe 5 years ago and they have really improved the rooms since our last visit.  There is a sliding door between the bedroom and the bathroom, so parents can use those facilities without awakening the kids.  There is also coin operated laundry on each floor. The addition of Panera Bread was a HUGE improvement.  We ordered breakfast through the Panera app and it was waiting for us each morning at our specified
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your great review, Deb! It pleases us to hear that your whole family enjoyed their stay and that our team blew you away. We look forward to our next opportunity to welcome you back for another 5-star stay.

Summary: This was one of the nicest, cleanest, Fairfield Inns I have ever visited.   They are current undergoing renovations, and we were put in a renovated room.   There is a sliding barn door (with frosted glass) to separate the sink/closet area from the main room.  Then there is a solid, locking door to the shower and toilet area.   This allows one person to change in privacy, while another is showering, while someone else may still be in bed.   There is a fast food place on the 3rd floor, as well as Panera and McDonald's in the parking lot.  Several other restaurants right by the hotel.   Easy walk to the parks . . if you've ever been to Disneyworld in Florida, I would compare it to walking from the Magic Kingdom to the Contemporary Resort.  Maybe even closer than that. Hotel gift
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review! We're delighted to hear that you found your room to be clean and that our team exceeded your expectations. Should you return to Anaheim, we hope to welcome you back for another seamless stay.

Summary: This is one of the closest hotels to Disneyland.  If you are going to spend a lot of time in the park, this is a good place to stay.  The price is comparable to other non-Disney hotels in the area.  We did run into a couple of problems.  First, the room entrances are similar to those in hotels (the access to the room is from the outside rather than a hallway inside the building).  Thus, you can definitely hear the fireworks at night (you can also have a decent view) of the fireworks if you stand outside).  The people next to us smoked on the outside walkway (although this is against the rules of the hotel) the odor came into our room.  Our room had a fresh coffee stain between the two beds, there was a smell of stale coffee for a couple of days, despite us bringing this to the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Gerald! While we're glad that you enjoyed our location, we're sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations in all aspects of your stay. We appreciate your valuable feedback. Should your travels bring you back to Anaheim, we hope to have the opportunity to exceed your expectations.

Summary Heading: Excellent, clean, super close to Disneyland entrance.
Summary: This has become our go-to hotel for Anaheim.  We have stayed at least 5 different times over the past 10 years.  It is clean and consistent in service and quality.  The rooms are large and beds comfortable.  I don't think there is a fridge which I find odd for the Disney area.  The pool is nice and well kept.  The parking is plentiful.  This hotel is steps from the crosswalk to Disneyland's entrance.
Manager Response: We're honored to be your Anaheim hotel of choice! Thank you for your continued loyalty to our hotel and for your review. From our service to our location, it sounds like our hotel is perfect for your travels. We look forward to your next stay!

Summary Heading: Great Stay Great Service Great Location
Summary: We just spent a 5 day Disney trip.  We decided to stay at the Fairfield Inn because of price and location. We were not disappointed with either, plus we had incredible service on all fronts.  Our room faced the park so we had night time views of all the lights and fireworks.  The room was clean and comfortable and service was always fast and friendly. We used the Marriott app to request things (like more towels) and the response was always immediate.   It about an easy 5 minute walk to the park, food services (Panera) close by, and a nice pool to relax by, 4 fast elevators, and laundry on every floor.  Also we bought our park tickets right in the lobby and they charged us for the price they paid at the time, not the recent Disney price increase. For the price and location this
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about your Disneyland getaway with us! We're so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay from our service and views to our location. Your positive feedback is very valuable to us. We hope to welcome you back for another magical vacation soon!

Summary: we went here for our summer vacation (in our country summer is january february and march). we chosed this hotel because it had a disney package, and also we trust Marriott a lot. WE weren't wrong. they had a pool , heated, also good rooms, and a small cafeteria to pick up breakfast, pizza, etc. You don't need a restaurant since there are a lot in the area. It's right across Disneyland so it was very convenient for us. They also got us a great car to drive us around stores and to L.A.
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing review. We're happy to hear you enjoyed our pool and rooms. We hope to welcome you again soon for another brilliant stay.

Summary: Not sure what the smell in the room but it smells more like motel or old home musty smell. Parking is $18 either valet or self park when other hotel is charging $15. Swimming pool is plus and short wakable distant to park is awasome. There is Panera bread and Mcdonald at the entrance so both of them are good option for bf and lunch sandwich. Price is way cheaper compare disney resort. We checked in and checked out early. Spent two night in this hotel and it is easy check in and out. We didn't bother to change the room because we use only to sleep for 8hrs. Bestwestern is much closer to the entrance.
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest review, Karl. While we're thrilled that you loved our pool area and our convenience to Disneyland, we're sorry to hear about the smell you experienced. We appreciate you letting us know so we can look into it. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a five-star stay in every way in the future.

Summary: We stayed 4 nights and did laundry 2 of those nights while on a whirl-wind vacation through California.  The Hotel is older but recently remodeled, with the rooms accessible through external walkways instead of internal.  We had a view of the pool and were near the far end of the the 2nd floor so we could easily pop over to the stairs to get in and out of the hotel instead of going through the main foyer.  No free breakfast, but we found that popping into Panera and picking up coffee, bagels and cream cheese to have something to eat while we walked to the park worked well.  The convenience of having the hotel so close to the park was appreciated when we saw the lines for the shuttles at the end of every day.  We had done a lot of hiking before arriving so having coin operated
Manager Response: We're so glad you enjoyed your stop at our hotel during your California getaway! Thank you for letting us know how much you loved our convenience to Disneyland and our laundry space. We're thrilled you had such a great vacation and we're honored to have been a stop on your journey.

Summary: I stayed at the Fairfield Inn for a large trade show. The room was comfortable and adequate for my needs. The bed was very comfy, and I slept well during my stay. The shower was excellent with a rainfall showerhead and plenty of hot water. Everyone on the staff went out of their way to say hello and ask how things were going. Would absolutely stay at the Fairfield Inn again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We're thrilled you found our rooms comfortable and our staff outstanding. We truly loved hearing that you enjoyed your stay! Thank you again and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Close to Disney and walking distance to Convention Center
Summary: Stayed for 5 nights for a convention. Easy 15-20 min walk to Convention Way. Parking in site.  McDonalds and Panera are right next door. Room was clean, service was good.  Only reason I didn't give 5 stars on ranking is the rooms are "motel style" and doors open to the outside.
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your great review and we're delighted to hear that you found your room to be clean. Should you return to Anaheim, we look forward to another seamless visit.

Summary: Thank you for your customer service.  They were very efficient, and courteous.  When we had a problem they not only helped resolve the issue but upgraded our stay as well.  It was clean and comfortable.  I would stay there again and would recommend this to anybody else looking to stay near Disnyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your generous 5-star review! We're delighted to hear that our team exceeded your expectations and that your room was clean and comfortable. We sincerely look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Nice room, Cost efficient, GREAT location!
Summary: We were headed to Disneyland and wanted a place to stay that was within walking distance of the park, had food nearby, was clean, and reasonably priced.  We were not disappointed.  This hotel was perfect!  We were able to wake up in the morning and walk to the park gates - no waiting for shuttles, no figuring out rental cars - EASY.  It was so close to the park that the night we arrived we could very loudly hear the fireworks..we were exhausted from a long day of travel, so I have no idea if we could have seen them, but I wouldn't doubt it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review, Kristy. We're so glad we could not only meet but exceed your expectations during your stay. From our proximity to Disneyland to our great neighborhood dining options, it sounds like you had a great visit. We hope to welcome you again soon!

Summary: This was our second time staying at the Fairfield. It will not be our last. We were lucky to be in one of the recently renovated rooms and it was lovely. Loved the sliding door to close off the bathroom area and the new laminate floors. All the staff we encountered were very pleasant and super friendly. From the front desk staff to the parking guys. It's nice to have someone wish you a good day and welcome you back each night.   Yes there was construction noise during the day but I was warned of this through my booking agent as well as the front desk when I checked in. It didn't bother us as we were seldom in the room during the day, but I can understand those with little ones may want to bring them back for naps. If this is the case maybe look somewhere else until the
Manager Response: Thank you for your stellar review, Paula. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our rooms and our location. We hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: Can't beat the location and the customer service is great!  No breakfast, but the McDonalds is super close so we made do with that for many of our meals. We felt it was more convenient to get to this hotel than even the Disney hotels. Especially with young kids, strollers, etc. We'd breeze right past those waiting for the shuttle/tram.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed our convenient location. We hope to welcome you again for another brilliant stay. Thank you for your 5-star review, Kira.

Summary: We were in town for a group function and we blocked about 30 rooms at the hotel.  Check in was a breeze, the front desk staff was very helpful and friendly.  Our rooms were ready on time.  They were in the middle of a remodel which we were told about at the time of booking.  Our rooms had been remodeled and were clean with modern furniture.  If you are a Marriott fan, this location maybe doesn't fit the typical Marriott brand picture.  But it is walking distance to restaurants, Disneyland, and right off of the I5 Freeway (don't worry, it's far enough you can't hear any traffic).  We always try to stay at a Marriott brand (we are members) and this location is a consistent one.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We're happy to hear you enjoyed check in and our convenient location. We hope to welcome you again soon!

Summary Heading: Extremely convenient, clean, great staff, and just what we needed!
Summary: My family and I stayed here overnight in order to enjoy two days at Disneyland.  I'm so glad we did.  I have small children, so we needed some place where we could park our car before and after checkout and walk over to the park.  I called a few other hotels in the area and they couldn't guarantee the parking, which was kind of a big deal (I didn't want to waste time and money moving my car).  The person I spoke to at the Fairfield was friendly, knowledgeable, and seemed to be all set for this - she said just to come on over and do a pre-check-in if our room wasn't ready.  We did so, and everything was perfect.  Valet parking saved us so much time and the attendants were extremely courteous.  The gentleman at the front desk was very gracious and courteous as well!  Our room was
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Eric. We're happy to hear you enjoyed our staff and service. We hope to welcome you again soon for another brilliant stay.

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel many times and yes its very convenient, its walking to distance to Disneyland without the Disneyland price. So this is a plus.  1. They are under remodel, the noise is incredible. Its like someone is jack hammering non stop right next to your hotel bed, why?? Because they are! And there was no warning of this at the front desk nor online during booking. If you are hoping to walk back for quiet time away from the park during the day or to let your littles ones take naps, book somewhere else!   There were a couple other hiccups here but the hotel did they're very best to make up for it so I will not bash them for any of it. Thats the good part about staying Marriott, the impeccable customer service is unlike other brands.   Also, beware there is an $
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We're happy to hear you enjoyed our convenient location. We are also disappointed to hear we failed to live up to expectations during renovations. We hope you'll give us another chance so we can offer you a 5-star experience.

Summary: NOW THIS.... this is what you call walking distance to Disneyland! You can practically feeeel Disneyland because of how close this hotel is.   Upon entering the hotel, you feel the warmth that the hotel has to offer from their parking attendant, to Front Desk associates, to their housekeeping. The décor of this hotel is OF COURSE Disney themed and I loved every part of it. This hotel is perfect especially if you want to start your day SUPER early and need a mid-day rest before continuing on all the way until 12am (at the park) and 2am at Downtown Disney.  Looking for a hotel that brings you the spirit of Disneyland from start to finish BUT at a reasonable rate? Choose this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about your wonderful stay with us! It's great to hear that our proximity to Disneyland made your vacation even more magical. We're thrilled your entire stay was filled with warmth and fun. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Good for a Family of 5-6 that wants only one room - walking distance
Summary: When we go to Disneyland, we go for 3 days and we have two families traveling together.   We want to stay within walking distance (ideally on South Harbor near the crosswalk) and need at least 3 separate beds to make this work.   We tried the Fairfield for the first time and it worked great!  Our room had 2 Queen beds, a Queen Sofa bed, and a Twin Chair bed.  The main room had the 2 queens and the sofa chair, with the side room having the queen sofa bed.   Note that there is NO door between the two rooms, so you can't close that room off.     The sink area included an open closet space and the mini fridge and safe.  The sliding door closes this space off from the sleeping area, but the door has frosted glass so it DOES emit light into the sleeping area when you turn on the sink
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel for your family getaway to Disneyland! We're so glad that our guest rooms and location worked out well for you. We're sorry to hear you didn't enjoy your breakfast sandwiches, however, and we appreciate your feedback. We love hearing that you would come back again and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you all back again soon!

Summary: Kind of expensive way to stay in Anaheim if you are going to Disneyland.  Rennovated a old hotel room and pictures that were shown on web sight looked nothing like what  you see at the hotel.  The rooms were updated.  No carpet on the floors. Laminate tile.  Not as kid friendly has had hoped.  If you request an upper level you are supposed to be able to see the fireworks from Disneyland.  Requested upper rooms we got a view of the busy highway and below was all the metal containers for there rennovations.  Doors did not close tight and all you heard was the traffic all night.   Metal railing around building.  Friendly staff.  Had a snack and pizza area with game room on 3rd floor.  If you stay request front of building. Much better view.  Small but nice pool area on front of
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We appreciate your honest and constructive feedback about your room and the traffic noise. We hope you'll return again so we have another chance to offer you a 5-star stay.

Summary: THe Fairfield Inn is my very favorite place to stay when I am at Disneyland..even over and above the on property hotels..They have Disney themed rooms and are a lot less expensive..Next door is McDonalds...and just down Harbor Blvd from IHop...then across the street to Disneyland....The hotel also has a restaurant in their parking lot and kids eat free..so it really is a budget saver..but call ahead early as it fills up quickly..
Manager Response: We're incredibly honored to hear that our hotel is your favorite choice for vacationing to Disneyland! Thank you for letting us know why from our themed guest rooms to our convenient location. We greatly appreciate your kind words and we look forward to seeing you next time!

Summary: Great location. 5 minute walk to the Disney parks. Good value. Stayed 4 nights and saved $1000 over staying at Disney properties. Room was clean and service was great. The pool was cold but the hot tub was nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this kind review! We're thrilled you enjoyed your stay with us. We love our proximity to the park! We hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back on your next visit.

Summary Heading: That staff was awsome. They helped anyway they could. Except when the dryer for our wet cloths eat our coins, 1.50 .
Summary: Never will I stay on the side that the pool is on. And make sure the are finished remodeling above your room. And they charge you for parking sounds like Vegas . And stay on the side where you can see the fireworks at night from Disney .
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing both your positive and constructive feedback with us. We're so glad you found our staff so helpful. We truly appreciate all of your valuable input and we're sorry to hear about the issue you experienced with the dryer. We will be sure to look into this. We hope to welcome you back for a seamless stay soon.

Summary: Stayed here recently for a family vacation. Location of hotel was great. Easy walk to Disneyland Resort. Hotel was clean and well furnished. Beds were very comfortable after a long day at the parks. Close to many restaurants and we considered it exactly what we needed. I would highly recommend staying here and would return in the future. Staff was friendly and accommodating.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review! We're elated to hear that your stay exceeded your expectations and that you found your room to be comfortable and clean. We truly look forward to welcoming you back for another 5-star stay in the very near future.

Summary: Very loud. If you want to sleep and listen to your neighbors sleep, you got it at this hotel. Gross bath tub and very old carpet .  Was clean and very nice people at the reception . So sad that is in a such amazing location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid feedback. While we're thrilled to hear that our team we helpful and friendly and that you enjoyed our proximity to the nearby attractions, we're disappointed to hear that your room did not meet your expectations. We truly hope to have another opportunity to welcome you back for the 5-star stay that you deserve.

Summary: This Marriott property is being refurbished and we stayed in a remodeled double-queen room. The room accepts five with an additional fold-out chair that extends into an almost-twin bed. The rooms have new furniture, flooring, fixtures, and large screen TVs. The remodeled lobby is airy and welcoming.  Much better than other older hotel properties that are this close to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback! We find our guests' input very valuable to us. We're thrilled you loved our new look! We truly appreciate your kind words and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: If you are going to Disneyland and not planning on spending much time at your hotel.  This is a perfect place to stay.  Good price, convenient location - my only complaints would be there weren't a lot of choices at the hotel for food (McDonalds and Panera is basically in the driveway) and the housekeeping knocked on my door at 7:30 a.m. on Sunday morning.  Sigh.  Really convenient, affordable hotel for a Disney trip.  If I don't want pool time, I'd stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your review with us. We're thrilled that you found our location convenient for visiting Disneyland. We're sorry to hear that our housekeeping team arrived before you had left your room for the morning and we appreciate all of your helpful feedback. We hope to welcome you back again in the future for a five-star stay.

Summary: Really good proximity to Disneyland and a good price. We stayed a couple days and slept really well. There is work happening, but we never noticed. There is a small Pizza Hut/cafe on the third floor, but no complimentary or continental breakfast. The staff was terrific from the the desk to the valet, all super nice and attentive.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. While we're thrilled that you loved our convenient location and terrific staff, we're sorry to hear that you did not find your stay deserving of five stars. Your feedback is very valuable to us and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a seamless experience in the future.

Summary: Fairfield is always the only hotel we stay at when we visit Disneyland. The staff is always friendly, the hotel is clean and they located right across the street, just a 5 min walk to the Disneyland gates. Perfect for any one!! Especially for families with little children where you want to be close to the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your generous 5-star review! We're thrilled to hear that our team went above and beyond to assist you and we truly look forward to welcoming you back for many more magical visits in the near future.

Summary: Spent several nights at this hotel while attending the NAMM Show.  The hotel is currently undergoing renovations but it didn't effect us whatsoever.  The staff is extremely accommodating and very friendly.  It is a fantastic location, within walking distance to the Convention Center and right across the street from Disneyland.  Even got to watch the fireworks from the balcony and it was a spectacular view.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review regarding your NAMM stay! We love hearing that you found our staff accommodating, our location ideal and our views spectacular. We truly appreciate your feedback and we hope you'll join us again in the future.
